# Deployment Docs

## Deployment

- [Running the app](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/index.md): Learn how to run an Orleans app in .NET.
- [Azure App Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/deploy-to-azure-app-service.md): Learn how to deploy an Orleans shopping cart app to Azure App Service.
- [Azure Container Apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/deploy-to-azure-container-apps.md): Learn how to deploy an updated Orleans shopping cart app to Azure Container Apps.
- [Kubernetes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/kubernetes.md): Learn how to host an Orleans app with Kubernetes.
- [Service fabric](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/service-fabric.md): Learn how to host an Orleans app with Service Fabric.
- [Handle failures](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/handling-failures.md): Learn how to handle failures in Orleans apps.
- [Troubleshooting Azure Cloud Services deployments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/troubleshooting-azure-cloud-services-deployments.md): Learn how to troubleshoot an Orleans app deployed to Azure Cloud Services.
- [Consul deployments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/consul-deployment.md): Learn how to use Consul as a membership provider in .NET Orleans.
- [Docker deployment](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/docker-deployment.md): Learn how to deploy Orleans apps with Docker.
- [Troubleshoot deployments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/deployment/troubleshooting-deployments.md): Learn how to troubleshoot common Orleans deployment issues.
